website_summaries.verdict: It is an expensive showerhead, but it's a luxurious one that will more than pay for itself in the long run.
pros: Huge showerhead with 2 modes: gentle rain and concentrated rinse
cons: Expensive, but here's a hint: go for the basic chrome finish to save some money

customer_reviews.title: The most AMAZING shower I’ve ever taken!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is by far the most intense shower head I’ve ever used! Nothing I can type in this small box could possibly do this shower head justice, so look at the video I made. I removed the flow regulator thing, easy enough with a pair of needlenose pliers. My god it was like being in the middle of a monsoon. So much water, such intense pressure, it was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Vivek D

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head, far less costly than Grohe with better results. Well made and easy to install. Be sure to remove the little green flow suppresser with a needle nose pliers for more water and better flow.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Beer

customer_reviews.title: Rust Prone
customer_reviews.text: My initial impression of the product was good; however, time does reveal true quality. After 3 year the shower head is an unsightly rusted mess. The previous shower head lasted over 10 years, so this one suffers in comparison. For the price it is definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shower head.....well worth the cost and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but you can tell why when you pull it out of the box and use it. So many shower heads are made with inferior plastic parts. This is a joy to use every time we step in the shower. It's pretty expensive for a shower head, but it's well worth it if you're looking for a combo shower head that is well built and will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Cyle Caplinger

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shower head
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shower head. I removed the restrictor inside (look up youtube video for instructions) and it feels perfect in both modes. One really interesting thing that people didn't really make clear in their reviews is how much hotter the shower is now with the Moen technology. I literally put it 1/4 turn lower than I used to put it because it's so much hotter now. I love this shower head and highly recommend it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Decent pressure with water saver removed.
customer_reviews.text: Nice flow and acceptable pressure if you remove the H20 saver, I recommend googling how to remove it. I have great H20 pressure and given the H20 saver was removed the flow is still gentle. If you have really thick long hair you will need to change to the 2nd setting.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Even with low pressure/volume in my house, this shower head is much better than the one it replaces (a standard sized Moen head). The full head gives a nice rain-like feel, but you can easily get more focused pressure for rinsing (if needed) by moving the lever. I (like others that have commented) just left the water saver green "filter" in the shower head, but I might eventually try it without it. It's great even with it in there, but I bet it's awesome without it. I just don't want to waste the water and pay the extra water bill.
customer_reviews.author: bnett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Somehow this showerhead soaks you in a matter of seconds. It drenched you in a relaxing spray of water. This isn't a huge 14 inch showerhead that you see in some obnoxious hotel showers. I didn't want one of them. They are hard to get your face out of the stream when you want. I recommend that you mount this in a shower with 9 foot walls or higher. That way the water has time to spread out as it falls. The feeling is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: howlin at the moon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Showerhead
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have had a multi-selection (different pressure and messages) shower head for years. When it cam time to replace it we decided to replace it with a large shower head like we had at an upscale hotel in Key West. We can be happier with the Moen 2 function rain shower. The gentle rain is more relaxing than any multifunction shower we have ever used. The higher pressure function on the shower head is just the "perfect" higher pressure. I am just worried that our water bill will increase drastically because of the longer showers we are taking.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy250

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower head. From start to finish, it took 30 mins to install. We used the help video How to Install a Shower Head for Dummies on YouTube. The diameter is wide, so we ordered the Moen 14” extender arm. The shorter arm works, but it doesn’t have the same jazzy, high class look. You can find this piece in the Frequently bought together section at the end of the shower head product listing on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SMM

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an upscale bathroom I build over the past year for my master bathroom. I wanted something that would really impress me. This showerhead consistently came up for the top 10. I thought it was a bit pricy but went for it anyways hoping for that great experience. I'm so disappointed for what I paid for. the shower is so mundane and the flow and water experience is not too different than my $15 cheap shower head that looks similar. I probably wouldn't be so disappointed if the shower head costs less but almost $300 for this! Absolute trash.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for showers, awful for dripping
customer_reviews.text: My downstairs neighbor thought something was wrong with the plumbing listening to this thing drop directly above their bedroom for hours every night. I have to set a washcloth underneath it so the dripping doesn't drive both of us crazy at night. It's a wonderful rainfall showerhead, but the hours of dripping afterward are almost too much. I've never had a shower head drip like this.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Namey

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head if you can get it on sale
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong I like the product but it's way over priced. $200+ is about twice what I feel it's worth. Simple to install, even has flat surface to make tightening easier. I removed the rubber ring to increase water pressure. With the restrictor it just was not enough water pressure for me. I left the green plastic piece but it's plenty strong enough now.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Love 2 options
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you can go from rain shower to regular shower. If you don’t have city water make sure you take out the restrictor. Our contractor said is doesn’t work right if you take it out. Poppy cock! We did and all is well. Also the water is cooler in rain shower mode. There are no children in our house so we have water heater at max and it’s perfect. The head is constructed very well.
customer_reviews.author: barbara j adkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pressure and size!
customer_reviews.text: After going on vacation to a resort with an incredible shower head, we decided that we were due for a home upgrade. For the price, size, and pressure, I am 100% happy with our new spa-like rainforest shower head. We purchased an additional horizontal extension pipe, which I would highly recommend. Will most likely purchase more of these for our two guest baths.
customer_reviews.author: staceym

customer_reviews.title: Can't Believe I spent this much but love it
customer_reviews.text: I and the family love this shower head. I returned another Moen shower head because of the water flow being so lacking. My husband installed this at first without removing the flow restrictor and it was okay- certainly better than the other one I had bought. I told him to take the restrictor out and did that make a difference! Removing the little green flow restrictor was not as easy for us as the other reviewers, but told him it was coming out even if he had to drill it out! Hope it holds up for a LONG time as it is crazy expensive.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: This product is not bad but I felt like it could've been better. For how expensive the product is and the brand, I felt like it could have more to offer. After months of use, the spray from the water is not straight and feels like the rubber pieces are plugged from the head. At least the 2 option spray is nice but compared to others this does not wow me enough compared to cheaper products out there with the same performance and cheaper prices.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome showerhead!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. When I remodeled my bathroom, I really wanted a larger showerhead, but was hesitant of rainfall ones thinking it wouldn't have enough pressure. But this one is great. I did remove the water flow restrictor (?) from the head before installation, and am very happy with it. I'm sure it would be fine with it in, I just want all the pressure I can get. I've been using it for 5 months and VERY happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Best shower ever!
customer_reviews.text: A relative recommended this rain shower for our remodeled bathroom shower. The new water outlet was set at 7+ feet to accommodate my 6’4” husband. We also installed a long, adjustable arm from water outlet to attach this shower head to. The shower has a lever that allows you to switch between the wide rain shower to a narrow diameter, more forceful shower stream if needed. We did remove the flow restrictor from inside the shower head. The whole family loves this shower head!
customer_reviews.author: Mspreitz

customer_reviews.title: A Monumental Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was tremendously excited when I read the reviews for this product. I could not wait to have the grand shower experience so many have reported in their reviews of this product. Sadly, the flow was abysmal, even with the regulating device removed. On the rain head setting, the flow is not sufficient to even remove soap. On the concentrated setting, it was at least functional. I had a better quality shower with the no-name, one-step-above-builder-grade shower head that came with the house. I would not install this shower head, even if it were provided at no cost, much less for the price required.
customer_reviews.author: Southerngrace

customer_reviews.title: Best showerhead!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is life changing! It is very large and feels like I am being showered in a warm steamy strong rainfall. I read prior reviews and followed instructions of pulling out the plastic green flow restrictor using pliers prior to installation. The flow is so strong even with the rain setting, I hardly turn it up to the stronger setting! I will definitely be taking this showerhead with me when I move to another house! Cannot recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mikals

customer_reviews.title: Shipping box was missing instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived without any installation instructions or materials (Teflon tape). Neither this product's description on Amazon nor its page on the Moen website include any installation instructions either. I had to hunt down individual reviews and videos to figure out whether I needed Teflon tape, and then had to order it and wait another few days for it to arrive. Would have much rather paid a little more for the convenience of everything needed to install this to be included in the shipment (or for a link to online instructions at the very least).
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad A.

customer_reviews.title: Finger prints everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this shower head. I bought it because I did not want the finger prints. I thought this was what brushed nickel was supposed to do. Well, I was wrong on this shower and not the brushed nickel concept. I bought a Moen faucet of the same brushed nickel color and no matter how I touch it you'd never know I touched it. I think something went wrong with the production of this one. Dont buy if fingerprints are important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a great shower
customer_reviews.text: The Moen S6320BN Velocity Two-Function 8-Inch Diameter Rainshower Showerhead, Brushed Nickel looks great in our new shower. The coverage is good, and like the 2 different settings, although I would have like more options. Despite that, it provides good water pressure to wash/rinse my hair AND gives the perfect overall showering experience. The ratings on this showerhead were spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Best shower of my life!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is amazing! I bought it to replace my tiny builder grade shower head. It’s made my shower a magical place where time stands still. I took a shower tonight I thought I was in the shower for only a few minutes. Turns out I was in there for an hour. This shower head feels like you’re standing in a heavy rain shower or under a waterfall. I took out the green regulator like others recommended in their reviews and it works beautifully. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase. It was super easy to install which is also an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: MEganG

customer_reviews.title: Squeeze it with 2 fingers top and bottom see if there is a play
customer_reviews.text: There is a play between the top and bottom you can squeeze it with 2 fingers and its squeaking, product is not solid, for that price it should not have any defects. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it...
customer_reviews.text: So much better than anything you can buy at the big box home improvement stores. Every bit of it screams quality - from the feel of the materials to the silky smooth operation of the mode lever. I replaced an $80 "name brand" 8" rain shower head I previously purchased at Home Depot and the difference is remarkable. In summary, it may seem expensive when compared with what you can buy at Lowes et al. but the difference in quality is worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!  So easy to flip modes!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We did remove the water restrictor. Phenomenal pressure. It was marginal but sufficient with it in. The flip from rain shower to pressure shower is so easy and smooth. What a pleasant change from the shower heads with clunky twisting between modes. We did buy an extension arm for ~$15 which allows us to put the head at the perfect angle for us.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Pure Shower Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I have never enjoyed a shower more than I do now. This showerhead is absolute perfection! I've read some people complain about the water pressure, but I haven't experienced that. The pressure is great and I couldn't be happier with this showerhead. I definitely recommend it. It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cadence

customer_reviews.title: but it really doe work better than everything else
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but it really doe work better than everything else. And I could honestly say that before I just recently removed the water constrictor because of our low water pressure. It was great before; now wow. The two position valve is really great for rinsing hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Lawrence Kelter

customer_reviews.title: I finally have a spa in my own home!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this new showerhead! It matches perfectly with our Price Feister hardware in the bathroom. Very easy to install. Using it is very easy. Water comes out like a gentle rainshower at only 2.5 gal/minute! Turn the little lever on the side, and now we have strong/hard stream of water to pound on my back. Little nobules on shower head surface seem to dry within a few hours, so hoping I don't get the little white build up. I wipe the surface every day after showering. This showerhead is about appetizer/salad plate size, not too wimpy looking, or overwhelming the shower stall, I think it looks great...
customer_reviews.author: Srdoc100

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower head for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the price at first, but this shower head is worth it! I tried it without the water restrictor and with it, I found that this shower head has great pressure either way, but found myself consuming a lot more hot water without it so I decided to put it back in. We have a newer home, even though the builder gave us pretty nice shower heads, I was yearning for something with a little more power, and this did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Moen quality is the best
customer_reviews.text: Well made Moen fixture. Chrome finish is brilliant. The control lever is smooth and easy to use. Not a real issue but if anything I wish there was just a bit more tension in the tilt mechanism. Great performance so far, enjoying the rain shower.
customer_reviews.author: Carz

customer_reviews.title: Two pressure settings, nice finish.
customer_reviews.text: Nice finish. We like having the two spray settings. The high pressure setting is not bad for rinsing hair. The low pressure, wider, rainfall setting is best for a relaxing feeling of warm rain falling, not really what you use every day.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I like it, don't love it
customer_reviews.text: I like it, don't love it. I would probably love it if I removed the water restrictor from the back, but as it is I'm content with the water pressure in the "jet" mode. Price was outrageous (expensive).
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Williams III

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I love this Moen shower head but would like to increase the flow since I have long hair and need a bit more flow to get it rinsed well... Can someone explain to a lay person in easy to follow directions how to increase the flow... Thanks so much, hope I don't need a plumber to do it 😉
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Love MOEN!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is made by Moen....GREAT quality!!! Rather than rattle on about this shower head, I've just attached the photos. Looks Amazing and works wonderfully! Be sure to buy the extension arm...works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great flow & pressure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile ago but finally finished the bathroom renovation and installed it last week. I love it. I have not removed the flow control and I think it has great flow in both the rain shower mode and the regular shower mode. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Magli840

customer_reviews.title: best shower head i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: best shower head i have ever used. i feel like i went swimming every time i use it. i tried shower heads with multi settings before and didnt feel they were necessary. this has 2 settings only and that is enough. totally worth the money. one of the greatest purchases for me this year, it is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: harsubagh

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice shower head
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shower head. I like the simplicity. A single lever switches it from rain mode to a more centralized and forceful normal shower stream. In the past I had several shower heads that had lots of different adjustment. None of which were used much. I found the setting I liked and left it there. The few times I did try to switch settings, I found it difficult and frustrating to twist the dial. Especially after a few years when lime deposits built up. The lever on the new Moen Velocity makes it very easy to switch modes. It looks really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: David Russell Hill

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shower head!!! It has different settings but the lightly falling rain shower is my favorite. It is just what I desired for my new DIY walkin shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to start the day. The 2 adjustments are perfect. It is one of those little luxuries that help. The price is right too. I did some serious research before purchasing the Moen S6320. It is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: The heavier shower spray option was ok but not quite strong enough. My shower pressure is not great. So I removed the plastic aerator/flow regulator, which was very easy, and now the pressure is fine. I recommend doing this, for a very expensive shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Abso

customer_reviews.title: Best shower I've ever had after removing limiter.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and well built shower head. I took the limiter out and have the best shower I've ever had. I also bought the Moen S113 Waterhill 14-Inch Replacement Extension Curved Shower Arm, Chrome to connect it to my existing pipe. Looks great with both parts. Great shower.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower head I've ever owned. It costs more than what you might get at your local big-box store, but it is built like a tank, and it produces the nicest, fullest, most satisfying spray. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: emmsf

customer_reviews.title: Everything the reviews have said is true
customer_reviews.text: Call me the skeptic. 300$ for a shower head? A magical mystical experience? The first thing you want to do when you get out of the shower is get back in? Yes. Yes Yes oh Yes. Just make sure you get a 16 or 17 inch extension for a tub type shower. (I bought the 20$ extension, not the $150 from Moen) And be ready for your own exquisite experience
customer_reviews.author: NORWAYGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Showerhead!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, this is the most excellent of showerheads I have ever had the pleasure of standing under!! When the water is turned on, you understand! Of course, after having read many of the reviews before going through with my own purchase, I was careful to try it, first, with the water restrictor in place, and then, without it! My goodness, what a magnificent difference! And of course, the lever gives a second level of showering enjoyment. This showerhead is well worth the $$ spent to own it. Thank you, Amazon, for getting it to me so quickly and in excellent condition. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Best Showerhead at Any price,TWO FUNCTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: How can I describe how great this Feels? Heaven comes to mind. The soft rainfall is sooo relaxing and the concentrated mode perfect for rinsing shampoo. Every shower is now a 5 Star Spa experience. Get this you deserve it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Amazing showers!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful rain style shower head. Very powerful water flow (no restricter) and a flip of the switch gives a great concentrated spray for rinsing. Easy to install. You won't be sorry with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: desdet

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head - wish Moen made it in stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is awesome. It provides good, even water pressure and I like that it does not splash too much on the shower door. Like others I removed the green flow regulator. It is very easy to install. I gave it 4 stars instead if 5 because Moen doesn’t have it in stainless steel, which would have matched the rest of my hardware. Highly recommended! Don’t wait.
customer_reviews.author: kiwicat

customer_reviews.title: Love this showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant about spending this much for a shower head, but after reading so many good reviews decided to take the chance. I love my shower time and this really added to the experience. Just completed my master bath renovation and this really added to the quality of the construction. I get many comments on how beautiful it looks in the shower. It has great full body coverage and just feels wonderful. It also has two settings...rain fall and high pressure. Never use the high pressure as I mainly want to relax with the normal setting which works great. Finish and material are high quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Great for our master bathroom remodel. It looks sharp, and I love the double spray features. Well worth it. Makes the bathroom feel like a spa.
customer_reviews.author: sparkyjones

customer_reviews.title: Great Showerhead
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this showerhead after reading reviews of many a showerhead. I've now used it for a couple of days and like it. The rain mode is interesting as I can't say I've ever experienced anything like it before. It takes a little getting used to as for someone who does not know what this is, they will think that there is not sufficient pressure. However, I'm sure that after a few minutes, they will realize that this is soft 'Rain' mode. I hope this lasts a while as I'm getting tired of changing the Waterpik shower every few years. The strange part about those is that they just stop working all of sudden.
customer_reviews.author: reefguy

customer_reviews.title: It really is different (and great)
customer_reviews.text: We redid two bathrooms. In the guest bathroom we got a good quality, but normal, Grohe. It's fine; nothing great, nothing bad. A normal shower head. For us, we splurged and got this baby. It's night and day in the two showers. The moment you step in you know you've gotten a superior shower head.
customer_reviews.author: jjo

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to a spa-like experience in your shower
customer_reviews.text: With the water-saver gasket removed, this shower head serves up a torrent of water unlike any other. Sure, it uses a lot of water that way, but if you have an adjustable shower faucet you can set it the way you want. Having a high volume of hot water coming down on you feels absolutely heavenly. Also, if you are accustomed to waiting for the shower to get hot, with the higher flow rate it gets hot in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Friedlander

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I've probably lived with about a dozen showerheads and sampled ten times that many while traveling here and abroad. This is the best ever. Two simple settings - both of which get used! Keeps clean. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: J. Panzer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shower experience for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to install. Provides shower experience similar to much higher priced products. Mounts directly to typical bent pipe feeder without extending further into the the shower stall. Simple adjustment from rain flow to directed flow if desired. Lightweight reduces stress on piping. If you want a great shower spend the extra money. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hood

customer_reviews.title: Greatly improved our shower experience
customer_reviews.text: We coupled this with a 14" Moen extension. The extra height in the shower is very welcome. Showering feels luxurious without wasting water. We mostly use the wide pattern, but the mechanism for switching back and forth between patterns feels like it is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Expensive plastic?
customer_reviews.text: The parts feel cheap, the front feels almost like plastic. I would have expected something a bit more solid feeling for the money. Not sure this one will hold up, but I do like the way the water feels coming out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Zdogg Siswick

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: This a great shower head and water pressure is not sacrificed. It also has two spray options.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, drenching shower
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an older rainshower and I love it. It gives a soft, drenching flow of water that I really enjoy. I have no problem with it rinsing the shampoo out of my hair on the wide flow, and the little lever you can use to concentrate the flow in the center is a nice addition. This was not an inexpensive item, but every time I step under it I'm delighted all over again that I decided to buy it. This does not give you a sharp, needlepoint water flow, so don't expect that. (by the way, if you want to run more water through this, pull out the green flow restrictor before you mount it)
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Just...awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great showerhead, and certainly for the price. Best is the simple dual-modes. Rainshower mode is amazing, with big, soft droplets in a pattern that totally covers your head. Unlike any shower I've ever taken. Then the force-directed mode gives plenty of power to rinse, but still with no "needle" feel to the spray. Love it. Also, a nice design, it will match any chrome-finished shower setup, well made and the lever works perfectly. Get the Moen 16-inch shower arm to go with it as I did and it's the perfect distance from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D RILEY

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a great shower head.
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible rain shower head. It has two adjustments, full rain fall and a power (hurricane force) concentrated rain fall. Lol. It is worth the investment. Enjoy the shower again for the first time. I'm buying another one for the second shower.
customer_reviews.author: Erich

customer_reviews.title: It is acceptable
customer_reviews.text: For me, I feel this head should not be used on an angle shower arm. When lever is positioned for center (stronger spray) the water leaks out the holes at the bottom.. It looks nice but for $300 at a big box vs $200 online it might still be a bit overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Alphazu

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece. It works well in both modes. I actually like the sharper spray, but the change to "rain" is a nice option. It looks good, and seems well made. I think the chrome has the better longevity. I've had issues with other finishes and my water.
customer_reviews.author: Screen saver!

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure and coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great rainshower head. I tried many different brands trying to find one with good water pressure. I drilled out the flow restrictor, which then popped out easily, and the installation was simple. The water pressure is great now, and my wife can rinse out her long hair in the half the time it was taking with the ridiculous low-flow shower heads.
customer_reviews.author: Carnac767

customer_reviews.title: Really good shower head
customer_reviews.text: This rain shower met expectations. As a previous reviewer indicated, taking out the green flow restrictor is easy to do and makes a huge difference on the quantity of water flowing out of this baby. The shower quality is on par with rain showers I've experienced at high end hotels. We usually keep it on the rain shower setting. Flipping over to the high pressure setting is really easy. On this setting, it really is a high power stream which feels great if you have a sore back. This is pricey compared to other showerheads but I don't regret splurging on something that makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Damone

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shower!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm 76 years old and have never in my life stood under a shower that comes close to this one! A super product
customer_reviews.author: WCS

customer_reviews.title: Very modern shower head
customer_reviews.text: I remodeled my bathroom and wanted a rain shower but also wanted a shower head that would rinse the soap out of my hair at the same time. When I saw this shower head it fit the criteria. It has a little handle on the side that when turned gives you a hard spray of water for rinsing off, turn it back and it has a relaxing rain shower. Nice looking and very modern, got it in brushed nickel and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bab's

customer_reviews.title: Solid showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The rain setting has a good amount of water with decent pressure. Power mode has good pressure. The wife has thicccccc hair and the shower head easily rinses shampoo from her hair. The 14" arm pipe was very nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: TJcooker

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price.... if you want a rain shower that is not vertically above you, this is a very nice alternative.
customer_reviews.author: JAMS

customer_reviews.title: Good Shower Experience
customer_reviews.text: Like other Men products that I have had, this shower head creates a very nice shower experience. That said though, we use it without the restrictor but are careful not to use the water at full force to still restrict the flow.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good Shower head
customer_reviews.text: Good Shower head. To increase flow you only need to remove the tiny black washer part of the flow restrictor. No need to remove the green plastic part (which is very difficult). This seems to nearly double the water flow.
customer_reviews.author: Tanstafl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband, who is NOT mechanically inclined, had no problem installing. That is saying a lot!!!! Gives us the lovely rain experience we desire.
customer_reviews.author: pHrx

customer_reviews.title: This shower head is wonderful. This one costs about 100
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is wonderful. This one costs about 100.00 more than some others that are similar in style but after researching the specs, this one has a concentrated velocity option rather than simply flowing out in a wide angle. It is also manufactured mostly with metal, not plastic so should have longevity. Both functions are great. The higher velocity is powerful and the wide flow is a pleasure. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: So glad I decided to do my research before buying a ...
customer_reviews.text: So glad I decided to do my research before buying a new shower head. Everything I read about this shower head was good and it did not disappoint. Our wife and I are really happy with it. Built like a tank and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Lino412

customer_reviews.title: Take out the plastic water restrictor
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Like others have mentioned it does drip a little after you turn the water off but that doenst bother me. I hooked it first without removing the restrictor. It wasn't bad but I'm on a well and want the water. It's easy to remove with pliers. It's a green plastic washer inside the supply line.
customer_reviews.author: Brad K.

customer_reviews.title: Blah shower head
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t experience “velocity” and returned it as an overpriced and over hyped shower head.
customer_reviews.author: MacDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is incredible. As others have stated you can remove the green aerator very easily with a pair of needle nose pliers. This thin dumps water and is the best shower I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Love to take showers with this!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and finish! Easy to change from regular shower to a rain shower. If you have good water pressure, this will work fine for you. A bit pricey, but I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Rainshower Indeed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product after I read the Amazon reviews for a $54 Delta 3-speed shower head I purchased at the local Home Depot. The coverage is impressive! I may install an S-curve shower extension arm later, but for our stall this is perfect. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Karl Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great flow
customer_reviews.text: Remove the green. Flow restrictor and you will feel like you are in an amazon rainstorm! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Buckypeekn

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: I now how two of these shower heads in my house. Love the toggle that goes between rain shower and a stronger flow from the center. Easy to install. Good quality. No leaks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenks

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best shower head ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best shower head ever!!! The only thing is I would try it out with the green filter prior to removing it. I wish I would have done that first, I have really good water pressure and removed the green filter from reading the reviews. Because of that I don't ever use the knob for the higher pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Esparza

customer_reviews.title: excellent so far
customer_reviews.text: installed on outdoor shower in Texas. Hope it doesn't cook in the sun! So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great Seller - very quickly shipped and received in perfect condition. This shower head is large and it looks beautiful - we have a large shower - it's 6 feet long and 4 feet wide with a large bench at the opposite end so the size wasn't an issue but we had a cardboard template attached in place beforehand to check the size). Worth the money and we expect it WILL last a lifetime. Plumber installed so no info on DIY installation. (Oh, we bought the arched shower arm - looks fantastic in a 40's bathroom).
customer_reviews.author: M. Berg

customer_reviews.title: off the charts!
customer_reviews.text: I tell you, the world would be a better place if we all had this shower head! It is heaven! I did remove the water saver before it was installed. (a bit of a trick) It is the little green bit of plastic. Pitch the whole thing, tiny rubber bike tire and all. I got it out with a very small flat head screw driver. I wish I could give this more than five stars- it is off the charts!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sechrest

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shower Head!
customer_reviews.text: Spa like quality. Amazing shower head and makes showering a luxurious experience.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This showerhead is amazing. You will drain your hot water quicker, especially if you remove the flow restriction. But it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Showerhead!
customer_reviews.text: We love this showerhead! I read reviews about people removing the water flow control. I'm not sure why. I have long thick hair and wanted something that would rinse my hair quicker. My partner didn't want a water flow that was too hard. This was the perfect solution for us. A wider, heavier flow for me and a rain shower for him!
customer_reviews.author: Lndadream

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great water flow that is incredibly relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love the rainfall showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Great rainfall shower head, with multiple pressure settings. I prefer the more powerful spray. The spray nozzles do trap debris from the water, but you can move them side to side with your finger and it will usually clear up the stream of water. Occasionally I do soak the head in some household vinegar to remove internal deposits. It does not seem to damage the finish at all. Highly recommend this product. It has a great warranty also.
customer_reviews.author: Couldbfishin

customer_reviews.title: All of our family members like this shower head...
customer_reviews.text: All of our family members like this shower head and we have been using for a week. It is easy to install and appears to be of high quality. It provides two settings and both these settings are very effective. When we opened the package, we were surprised to see the size of the shower head, it is quite large. We did not get that impression from the pictures or the video. However after installing, it looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Satya N Volla

customer_reviews.title: nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Well recommended. Nice rain shower. I might suggest a longer arm so that it isn't too close to the wall. It does adjust, but not that much.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: couldn't be happier. Worked as advertised plenty of water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Read several of the reviews and decided to give this shower head a try, couldn't be happier. Worked as advertised plenty of water pressure. The flow is even thru out the head and the smaller setting worked well. I don't know way you would want to use it seeing you bought a 8" head.
customer_reviews.author: William M McDowell

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT STOP DRIPPING
customer_reviews.text: Professionally installed; it drips - a rush of water - 20 seconds to 20 minutes after it is turned off. AND IT CONTINUES TO DRIP CONTINUOUSLY, causing the shower floor to remain wet all the time.
customer_reviews.author: 4th Corner Eater

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money. Don't go cheap
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Rain drops keep falling on my head. 🎵. Quality is excellent. Spend this kind of money or more for a good quality rain fall shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Tony A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems excellent. The head is relatively heavy
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems excellent. The head is relatively heavy, but I think that is because it is so well made. I would have rated the head six stars but it needs an extension tube (that I do not want to install into a wall that backs up into a bedroom closet). Otherwise, I think it works very well. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is amazing! Spray radius and pressure is perfect for the giant walk in shower in our new home. We did take the flow restrictor out. Well worth the price we paid. At the time we bought, Amazon was the cheapest ($185). I will buy again for the other baths in my home, just as soon as it goes back on sale. ;)
customer_reviews.author: aswaney

customer_reviews.title: This is the showerhead you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a better showerhead and this fit the bill. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. Herman

product_meta.title: Moen S6320 Velocity Two-Function Rainshower 8-Inch Showerhead with Immersion Technology, Chrome
product_meta.description:
Color:ChromeEnjoy a rainshower experience you can control with the Moen Velocity showerhead. This 8 inch rainshower features Immersion technology, an innovative system that provides three times more spray power than most rainshowers for a more thorough rinse. It also lets you adjust water flow with the flip of a lever, so you can choose between a full spray or concentrated rinse. And thanks to its attractive design and highly reflective chrome finish, this rainshower complements a variety of styles.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The rainshower experience that you can control is available in the velocity showerhead with Immersion technology. A flip of a lever allows either a calming rain rinse function or a self-pressurized spray. Moen is dedicated to designing and delivering beautiful products that last a lifetime. Moen offers a diverse selection of kitchen faucets, kitchen sinks, bathroom faucets and accessories, and showering products. Moen products combine style and functionality with durability for a lifetime of customer satisfaction.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE DESIGN: Chrome finish is highly reflective for a mirror-like look that works with any decorating style

POWERFUL RINSE: Advanced, self-pressurizing Moen Immersion rainshower technology channels water through the showerhead with three times more spray power than most rainshowers for a more thorough rinse
FULL COVERAGE: Large spray head rainshower for exceptional water coverage
TEMPERATURE CONTROL: Single handle lever make it easy to adjust the water

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars679 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
